summary: A story of a college student (Tatsuo Saitô) and his schoolmates trying to pass the exams by cheating.
cast: Tatsuo Saitô|Kaoru Futaba|Kinuyo Tanaka|Tomio Aoki|Hiroshi Mikura|Ichirô Okuni|Chishû Ryû|Kenji Satome|Tokio Seki|Ichirô Tsukida|Hiroo Wakabayashi|Fusao Yamada|Goro Yokoyama|Debuo Yôko
title: Suspendí, pero...
